activities: Moontoast is a Software as a Service provider that allows its clients to sell digital music and physical goods through websites and social networks (like Facebook).   When an individual wishes to purchase an item they must create an account and agree to our terms and conditions.  That account can be as simple as specifying an email and password or can be done using a third-party such as Facebook or Twitter. , In addition to fulfill any purchase requiring physical goods we require a shipping addresses allowing for the fulfillment of any purchases.   All emails sent between buyers and sellers using the Moontoast system give the user the ability to opt out of future communications.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)
personaldata: Moontoast is a Software as a Service provider and collects email addresses, name, and shipping addresses as part of its online registration and purchasing process. Moontoast outsources its Payment Processing to PCI Compliant Third Parties.
recoursemech: Moontoast has an agreement with the BBB EU Safe Harbor dated January 19, 2011.
